entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `branch` TEXT NOT NULL, `groupKey` TEXT NOT NULL, `displayName` TEXT NOT NULL, `phone` TEXT, `notes` TEXT)

indices.name: index_group_members_branch_groupKey
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_group_members_branch_groupKey` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`branch`, `groupKey`)

indices.name: index_group_members_branch_groupKey_displayName
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_group_members_branch_groupKey_displayName` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`branch`, `groupKey`, `displayName`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `date` INTEGER NOT NULL, `branch` TEXT NOT NULL, `groupKey` TEXT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_training_sessions_date
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_training_sessions_date` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`date`)

indices.name: index_training_sessions_branch_groupKey_date
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_training_sessions_branch_groupKey_date` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`branch`, `groupKey`, `date`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `sessionId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `memberId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `status` TEXT NOT NULL, `markedAtMillis` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_attendance_records_sessionId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_attendance_records_sessionId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sessionId`)

indices.name: index_attendance_records_memberId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_attendance_records_memberId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`memberId`)

indices.name: index_attendance_records_sessionId_memberId
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_attendance_records_sessionId_memberId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sessionId`, `memberId`)
